name: Cheesy Ham and Green Bean Casserole
ingredients: 1 small onion, sliced very thin, 2.5 ounces
2 14 ounce cans French-cut green beans, drained well
8 ounces pepper-jack, cheddar or Swiss cheese, shredded

instructions.en: Sauté onion and celery in butter until very tender and slightly browned.
instructions.sk: Opražte cibuľu a zeler na masle, kým nie sú veľmi mäkké a mierne zhnednuté.
instructions.ja: 玉ねぎとセロリをバターで柔らかくなり少し茶色くなるまで炒めます。

instructions.en: In a greased 2-quart casserole, mix green beans, mushrooms, ham, mayonnaise, and seasonings.
instructions.sk: V 2-litrovej vymastenej nádobe na zapekanie zmiešajte zelené fazuľky, huby, šunku, majonézu a korenie.
instructions.ja: 2クォートのグリース塗りのキャセロール皿に、グリーンビーンズ、マッシュルーム、ハム、マヨネーズ、調味料を混ぜます。

instructions.en: Stir in the sautéed onion mixture, then the shredded cheese.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte opraženú cibuľovú zmes, potom nastrúhaný syr.
instructions.ja: 炒めた玉ねぎミックスを加えて混ぜ、次に刻んだチーズを加えます。

instructions.en: Bake uncovered at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes, or until browned and bubbly.
instructions.sk: Pečte nezakryté pri 175°C 30 minút, alebo kým nie je zhnednuté a bublajúce.
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで30分間、または表面が茶色くなり泡立つまで蓋をせずに焼きます。

notes: Makes 6-8 servings. Do not freeze. If assembling ahead of time and chilled, bake an additional 10-15 minutes.
